verses.verse: And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, O <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and you <S%H7101>princes<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> Is it not for you to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4941>judgment?<s%>

Who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H7451>evil;<s%> who <S%H1497>pluck<s%> off their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from off them, and their <S%H7607>flesh<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> their <S%H6106>bones;<s%>

<S%H834>Who<s%> also <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7607>flesh<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6584>flay<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> them; and they <S%H6476>break<s%> their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H6566>chop<s%> them in pieces, as for the <S%H5518>pot,<s%> and as <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H7037>caldron.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> shall they <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> but he will not <S%H6030>hear<s%> them: he will even <S%H5641>hide<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from them at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> as they have <S%H7489>behaved<s%> themselves <S%H7489>ill<s%> in their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that make my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8582>err,<s%> that <S%H5391>bite<s%> with their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> and <S%H7121>cry,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace;<s%> and he that <S%H5414>puts<s%> not <S%H5921>into<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> they even <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> shall be to you, that you shall not have a <S%H2377>vision;<s%> and it shall be <S%H2821>dark<s%> to you, that you shall not <S%H7080>divine;<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> down <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H6937>dark<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

Then shall the <S%H2374>seers<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H2659>confounded:<s%> yes, they shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5844>cover<s%> their <S%H8222>lips;<s%> for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

But <S%H199>truly<s%> I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3581>power<s%> by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and of <S%H1369>might,<s%> to <S%H5046>declare<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2403>sin.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, you <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H7101>princes<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H6140>pervert<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3477>equity.<s%>

The <S%H7218>heads<s%> thereof <S%H8199>judge<s%> for <S%H7810>reward,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> thereof <S%H3384>teach<s%> for <S%H4242>hire,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> thereof <S%H7080>divine<s%> for <S%H3701>money:<s%> yet will they <S%H8172>lean<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Is not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us? <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> on us.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> shall <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for your <S%H1558>sake<s%> be <S%H2790>plowed<s%> as a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5856>heaps,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> as the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of the <S%H3293>forest.<s%>
